title: How 2025 F1 sprint races work: qualifying, points and schedule
summary: How F1 sprint race weekends work in 2025, including points awarded, the sprint shootout qualifying format, race length and results so far

qa_pairs.question: What is the primary purpose of a sprint race in Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: To provide an additional competitive event that determines the starting grid for the main race.
wrong_options: To replace the main race entirely
To award double points for the championship

qa_pairs.question: How are points awarded during a sprint race weekend in Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Points are awarded to the top finishers in the sprint race, contributing to the drivers' and constructors' championships.
wrong_options: Points are awarded based on qualifying times
Points are not awarded during sprint races

qa_pairs.question: What is the format of the sprint shootout qualifying session?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It is a shorter qualifying session designed to set the grid for the sprint race.
wrong_options: It consists of two separate qualifying sessions
It is held after the main race
